answers.text: The national horse and cattle show

plausible_answers.text: The national horse and cattle show

qas.question: Which festival is damaging the province's rural roots?
What does the Lahore festival discourage?

context: Exhibitions and annual horse shows in all districts and a national horse and cattle show at <b3_0>Lahore<b3_0/> are held with the <b4_0>official patronage<b4_0/>. <a0_0><b5_0>The national horse and cattle show<b5_0/><a0_0/> at <a1_0>Lahore<a1_0/> is the biggest festival where <a2_0>sports, exhibitions, and livestock competitions<a2_0/> are held. It not only encourages and patronises <b6_0>agricultural products and livestock<b6_0/> through the exhibitions of agricultural products and cattle but is also a colourful documentary on the rich cultural heritage of the province with its strong rural roots.
